text:
KGBSTTTT
TELEVISION 15/FM RADIO 89.5
February 24, 1969
Mr. John W. Macy, Jr.
President
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
Suite 630
1250 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington, D.C. 20036
Dear Mr. Macy:
I am very pleased to accept your invitation to join the Corporation's
Radio Advisory Committee for the coming two years. I will attend
the meeting of March 20 - 21 in New York.
I'm delighted to see GPB move ahead in radio, a medium with some
very imprcs ive characteristic > as well as some difficult problem .
Thanks very much for your invitation; I look forward to the assign¬
ment with real interest.
Sincerely,
John P. Witherspoon
JPW-.ej
bcc; Bob Mott
